### Block 1: Introduction to Probability

### 1. Dice Roll
# Probability of getting an even number (2,4,6) when rolling a fair die
```{r}
p_even <- 3/6
p_even
```
# Simulate 1000 rolls
```{r}
set.seed(123)
rolls <- sample(1:6,size =1000 , replace =TRUE)
freq_even <- mean(rolls %% 2 == 0)
freq_even
```
